item.title: Wife plots husband’s murder with lover weeks after wedding in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal/Nandyal: A 32-year-old man from Gadwal was found murdered just over a month after his wedding.
The police have arrested five individuals, including his wife and her alleged romantic partner, in connection with the crime that has sent shockwaves across both Telugu States.
Victim goes missing, body found in canal
Tejeshwar, a private land surveyor and dance master. He was a resident of Raja Veedhi in Gadwal, went missing on the evening of June 17 after leaving home in a car. A missing pe...]]>
item.author: Newsmeter Network

item.title: Murder Most Foul: Woman Plots Husband’s Murder With Help Of Paramour
item.description:
<![CDATA[ETV Bharat / bharat
Murder Most Foul: Woman Plots Husband’s Murder With Help Of Paramour
Mahabubnagar: In an alleged case of obsession, deceit and betrayal reported from Jogulamba Gadwal district, a newlywed woman got her husband murdered just 29 days after marriage to continue her affair with her boyfriend.
The victim, Ganta Tejeshwar, who was a surveyor from Gadwal, was married to Aishwarya alias Sahasra of Kallur in Kurnool district on May 18 at Anjaneyaswamy temple in Beechupalli.
Source...]]>
item.author: Etv Bharat
